DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability XL999 adult advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Study XL999 Adults With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Advanced solid tumor Cancer progress currently available therapy Life expectancy > 3 month Adequate bone marrow , liver , kidney function Willing use accept method contraception course study Negative pregnancy test ( female ) Written informed consent Chemotherapy within 46 week start treatment ( depend therapy ) Radiotherapy within 4 week start treatment Subjects know brain metastasis Uncontrolled medical disorder infection cardiovascular disease Subjects know HIV positive Pregnant breastfeeding woman
